COMPACTNESS.description: Represents the compactness of the vehicle, measured by the ratio of the bounding box to the pixels within the silhouette

CIRCULARITY.description: Represents the circularity of the vehicle, measured by the ratio of the area of the silhouette to the square of the perimeter

DISTANCE CIRCULARITY.description: Represents the distance circularity of the vehicle, measured by the ratio of the distance between the center of the bounding box and the furthest pixel within the silhouette to the circularity

RADIUS RATIO.description: Represents the radius ratio of the vehicle, measured by the ratio of the minor axis to the major axis of the best fitting ellipse

PR AXIS ASPECT RATIO.description: Represents the aspect ratio of the vehicle along the principal axis

MAX LENGTH ASPECT RATIO.description: Represents the maximum length aspect ratio of the vehicle, measured by the ratio of the length along the major axis to the length along the minor axis

SCATTER RATIO.description: Represents the scatter ratio of the vehicle, measured by the variance of the silhouette projection along the major axis

ELONGATEDNESS.description: Represents the elongatedness of the vehicle, measured by the ratio of the area of the silhouette to the square of the major axis length

PR AXISRECTANGULAR.description: Represents the rectangularity of the vehicle along the principal axis, measured by the ratio of the area of the silhouette to the area of the bounding box

LENGTHRECTANGULAR.description: Represents the rectangularity of the vehicle along the length, measured by the ratio of the area of the silhouette to the area of the bounding box

MAJORVARIANCE.description: Represents the variance of the silhouette projection along the major axis

MINORVARIANCE.description: Represents the variance of the silhouette projection along the minor axis

GYRATIONRADIUS.description: Represents the gyration radius of the vehicle, measured by the square root of the mean square distance of the silhouette pixels from the center of gravity

MAJORSKEWNESS.description: Represents the skewness of the silhouette projection along the major axis

MINORSKEWNESS.description: Represents the skewness of the silhouette projection along the minor axis

MINORKURTOSIS.description: Represents the kurtosis of the silhouette projection along the minor axis

MAJORKURTOSIS.description: Represents the kurtosis of the silhouette projection along the major axis

HOLLOWS RATIO.description: Represents the ratio of the area of the vehicle’s hollows to the area of the silhouette

target.description: Represents the class of the vehicle, with 0 being OPEL, 1 being SAAB, 2 being a bus, and 3 being a van
